name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff imbued with powerful healing magic.
looks: The staff is made of shimmering silver with a crystal orb at the top. It emits a soft glow of healing energy.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that restores nearby allies' health over time.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The sword has a simple design with a straight blade and a basic hilt.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that has the power to heal wounds and cure ailments.
looks: The staff has a long wooden handle with golden accents. At the top, there is a crystal orb that emits a soft glow.

special_effects.healing_mastery: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that can heal injuries and restore health.
looks: The staff is made of smooth white wood and has intricate designs of leaves and vines. It emits a gentle glowing light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Radiates a healing aura that restores health to nearby allies.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of Frost
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of ice and frost.
looks: The staff is made of polished crystal with swirling patterns of ice and frost within. It has a silver grip and a large blue gemstone at the top.

special_effects.freeze: Attacks have a chance to freeze the target, immobilizing them for a short duration.

name: Ring of Protection
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's defense
looks: The ring is made of silver with intricate engravings of shields and armor. It has a small gemstone in the center that emits a faint protective glow.

name: Warrior's Armor
description: Heavy armor designed to provide maximum protection to a warrior.
looks: The armor is made of thick steel plates and is adorned with intricate engravings. It covers the entire body and has a large metal helmet with a visor.
